quest: When is Halloween (an ancient festival) celebrated?
quest_zh: 什麼時候慶祝萬聖節（古老的節日）？

quest: How can you make a complaint about the Police? (Choose TWO)
quest_zh: 您如何對警察投訴？ （選擇兩個）

answers.answer: Writing to the Chief Constable of the police force involved
answers.answer_zh: 寫信給涉及警察部隊的首席警官

quest: Queen Elizabeth II was married to Prince Phillip
quest_zh: Queen Elizabeth II was married to Prince Phillip

quest: Where in Scotland is known as the home of golf?
quest_zh: 蘇格蘭哪裡被稱為高爾夫之家？

quest: In the 2021 England and Wales census, what percentage of people identified themselves as Christian?
quest_zh: In the 2021 England and Wales census, what percentage of people identified themselves as Christian?

quest: The leader of the Opposition usually becomes Prime Minister if his or her party wins the next General Election
quest_zh: 反對派的領導人通常會成為總理，如果他或她的政黨贏得下一次大選

quest: People don't celebrate Christmas as much as they used to before
quest_zh: 人們不像以前那樣慶祝聖誕節

quest: How many senior MPs get appointed by the Prime Minister to become ministers in charge of departments?
quest_zh: 總理任命多少高級國會議員成為負責部門的部長？

quest: When was the first public film shown in the UK?
quest_zh: 什麼時候在英國放映的第一部公開電影是什麼時候？

quest: What is Boxing Day?(Choose TWO)
quest_zh: 什麼是節禮日？（選擇兩個）

answers.answer_zh: 當人們觀看拳擊冠軍時

quest: It is illegal to sell tobacco products such as cigarettes, cigars, roll-up tobacco to anyone under what age?
quest_zh: 將煙草，雪茄和煙草等煙草產品出售給什麼年齡以下的人是非法的？

quest: By law, radio and television coverage of the political parties must be ____ , so equal time has to be given to rival viewpoints
quest_zh: 根據法律，各個政黨的廣播和電視報導必須為____，因此必須給予競爭對手的觀點

quest: In Northern Ireland some people speak Irish Gaelic
quest_zh: 在北愛爾蘭，有些人會說愛爾蘭蓋爾語

quest: How old was the Queen of Scotland, Mary Stuart when her father died and she became Queen?
quest_zh: 蘇格蘭皇后，瑪麗·斯圖爾特（Mary Stuart）多大了，她的父親去世並成為女王？

quest: What should you do when you move into a new house or apartment?
quest_zh: 搬進新房子或公寓時該怎麼辦？

answers.answer: Tell the people who live near you not to make noise
answers.answer_zh: 告訴住在你附近的人不要發出噪音

answers.answer: Introduce yourself to the people who live near you so they can help you
answers.answer_zh: 向自己居住在您附近的人介紹自己，以便他們可以幫助您

answers.answer: Warn the people who live near you not to talk to you
answers.answer_zh: 警告住在你附近的人不要和你說話

quest: What is the BBC funded by?
quest_zh: BBC資助的是什麼？

quest: The Commonwealth is an association of countries that support each other and work together towards shared goals in democracy and development
quest_zh: 英聯邦是一個國家的協會，互相支持並共同努力實現民主和發展中的共同目標

quest: What does the money raised from National Insurance Contributions pay for? (Choose TWO)
quest_zh: 從國民保險捐款中籌集的資金需要什麼？ （選擇兩個）

quest: Who was the Queen of the Iceni? She is still remembered today and there is a statue of her on Westminster Bridge in London
quest_zh: 誰是Iceni的女王？她今天仍然記得她，在倫敦的威斯敏斯特橋上有她的雕像

quest: What food is traditionally associated with Wales?
quest_zh: 傳統上哪種食物與威爾士有關？

answers.answer: Roast beef, which is served with potatoes, vegetables, Yorkshire puddings
answers.answer_zh: 烤牛肉，搭配土豆，蔬菜，約克郡布丁

quest: You need to buy a TV Licence if there are no TVs in your house but you watch TV programs on your mobile phone
quest_zh: 如果您的房屋中沒有電視，則需要購買電視執照，但您可以在手機上觀看電視節目

quest: In England and Wales, the small claims procedure is used for claims of less than what amount?
quest_zh: 在英格蘭和威爾士，小額索賠程序用於索賠小於多少？

quest: When was the Scottish Parliament formed?
quest_zh: 蘇格蘭議會何時形成？

quest: How often are the European Parliament elections held?
quest_zh: 歐洲議會選舉多久舉行一次？
